definition: to weigh up sb's words and observe their facial expression (idiom)/to discern what sb thinks from his body language
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
variant of 察[cha2]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
words/speech/to say/to talk
surname Guan

sentences.english: Want to be in the wine on the table to get the appreciation of all, we must learn to read.
sentences.chinese: 要想在酒桌上得到大家的赞赏，就必须学会察言观色。

sentences.english: It would be equally important for Sister Badgery to observe.
sentences.chinese: 察言观色对巴杰莉护士来说也同等重要。

sentences.english: She is good at watching the manager's every mood and guessing his thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 她善于察言观色，理会经理的心思。

sentences.english: A wise car hears one word and understands two.
sentences.chinese: 聪明的车一向善于察言观色。
